Hero.aboutText: DevMinds delivers precision-coded architectures for the post-digital era. Specializing in lean full-stack implementations. No legacy code. No technical debt. Pure computational efficiency.
Hero.description: We are a company specialized in web development, mobile applications and technology consulting. We transform ideas into exceptional digital products.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.description: We are a team specialized in creating cutting-edge digital solutions. We focus on clean architectures, scalable code and results that stand the test of time.
AboutUs.paragraph1: We are DevMinds, a team of developers passionate about creating digital solutions that transform businesses. We specialize in modern web development, mobile applications and technology consulting.
AboutUs.paragraph2: Our approach focuses on understanding each client's unique needs to deliver customized solutions that truly work and scale.
AboutUs.paragraph3: We work with the latest technologies on the market, ensuring your project is ready for the future.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services

faq-general-1.question: What services does DevMinds offer?
faq-general-1.answer: We offer modern web development, custom software, technical consulting and ongoing support. We work with the latest technologies to create scalable and efficient digital solutions.

faq-general-2.question: What makes DevMinds different from other development companies?
faq-general-2.answer: We focus on clean architectures, scalable code and zero technical debt. Each project is treated with personalized dedication, ensuring solutions that truly work and stand the test of time.

faq-general-3.question: How can I start a project with DevMinds?
faq-general-3.answer: It's simple: contact us through the form, email or WhatsApp. We'll schedule a free initial consultation to understand your needs and design a tailored solution.

faq-services-1.question: Do you handle complete web development projects?
faq-services-1.answer: Yes, we develop everything from landing pages to complex web applications with Next.js, React, TypeScript and all the modern technologies needed for a robust product.

faq-services-2.question: Do you offer consulting services for existing projects?
faq-services-2.answer: Absolutely. We perform code audits, performance optimization, architecture improvements and technical recommendations for projects in production.

faq-services-3.question: Do you provide support after project delivery?
faq-services-3.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance plans to ensure your application stays updated, secure and running optimally.

faq-pricing-1.question: How do you handle budgets?
faq-pricing-1.answer: Each project is unique. After the initial consultation, we create a detailed proposal with scope, timeline and fixed price. We also offer payment options by stages.

faq-pricing-2.question: What's the estimated time to complete a project?
faq-pricing-2.answer: It depends on scope. A landing page can be ready in 1-2 weeks, while complex applications may take 2-3 months. We always establish clear timelines from the start.

faq-technical-1.question: What technologies do you use?
faq-technical-1.answer: We work with React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, TailwindCSS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS and other modern web stack technologies. We choose tools based on each project's specific needs.

faq-technical-2.question: Does the source code remain my property?
faq-technical-2.answer: Absolutely. Upon project completion, you receive all source code, documentation and necessary access. You are the complete owner of your product.

Portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
Portfolio.subtitle: Explore our completed projects and the work we've done for our clients

softcount.title: SoftCount - Accounting Software
softcount.fullDescription: SoftCount is an accounting software developed with Next.js, TypeScript and PostgreSQL. Own project under construction designed to offer a complete accounting and financial management solution.

wilson-isaza.title: Wilson Isaza - Political Website
wilson-isaza.fullDescription: WordPress website developed for politician Wilson Isaza. Professional informative platform for his political campaign.

empo-guzman.title: Empo Guzmán - Public Companies Website
empo-guzman.description: Website for public companies on Wix
empo-guzman.fullDescription: Website developed on Wix for Empo Guzmán, focused on public companies. Design with customized templates.

devminds-portfolio.title: DevMinds - Professional Portfolio
devminds-portfolio.fullDescription: Professional portfolio built with Next.js 16, TypeScript, TailwindCSS and Framer Motion. Features multi-language i18n system (ES, EN, JA), smooth animations and modern responsive design.

About.title: Our Team
About.subtitle: Meet the people who bring ideas to life

bios.sebastianBio: Software Engineer passionate about creating exceptional user experiences. Specialized in frontend development with Next.js, React and TypeScript. I focus on building modern, efficient and scalable web applications that solve real problems.
bios.juanBio: Software Engineer focused on backend development and system architecture. Expert in API design, databases and scalable solutions that support robust applications.
bios.mariaBio: Psychologist specialized in user research and content strategy. Passionate about understanding user behavior and creating digital experiences that connect emotionally.
bios.carlosBio: Full Stack Developer with experience in building complete web applications. Specialized in modern technologies and scalable architectures for both frontend and backend.
